channel.title: Hear Me This Book
channel.itunes:summary: I haven't read that book that you think everyone should read. I haven't read many books at all. I know HOW, I just read many other things and do other things and STOP JUDGING. So, I'll have guests tell me their favorite book and what happens and why I dumb for not reading it. Enjoy.
channel.itunes:author: Steve Rannazzisi
channel.description: I haven't read that book that you think everyone should read. I haven't read many books at all. I know HOW, I just read many other things and do other things and STOP JUDGING. So, I'll have guests tell me their favorite book and what happens and why I dumb for not reading it. Enjoy.

item.title: #001 - Ari Shaffir and Bert Kreischer - The Road : Cormac McCarthy
item.description: This week Ari Shaffir, Comedian, host of "The Skeptic Tank" podcast and piece of human garbage, hears me "The Road" by Cormac McCarthy. We have a special guest host this week, Bert Kreischer. Bert is a comedian and the host of the "Bertcast" podcast. This podcast was taken from an episode of "Bertcast" that Ari and I were guests on in late 2016. Bert and Ari convinced me that it was finally time to start a podcast, and Hear Me This Book was born.
item.content:encoded: This week Ari Shaffir, Comedian, host of "The Skeptic Tank" podcast and piece of human garbage, hears me "The Road" by Cormac McCarthy. We have a special guest host this week, Bert Kreischer. Bert is a comedian and the host of the "Bertcast" podcast. This podcast was taken from an episode of "Bertcast" that Ari and I were guests on in late 2016. Bert and Ari convinced me that it was finally time to start a podcast, and Hear Me This Book was born.
